reasoning: A 500 server error from the TogglePin API endpoint is a genuine server-side bug. The asymmetric behavior where Pin works but Unpin fails with a 500 error indicates a real backend issue, likely in database handling or permission checking when toggling the pin status off.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows a properly pinned post with blue pin icon and Unpin link visible. Test report describes that clicking Unpin triggers a 500 error from TogglePin endpoint with an 'undefined' error message in an alert dialog. Pin functionality works correctly but Unpin fails, indicating server-side bug in the toggle-off logic.
scenario_id: Evoq.Social.ActivityStream::Post Pinning::Unpin a previously pinned post
